sentences.en: ...side effects occurring in fish that ingest this substance.
sentences.cn: ...在吃了此物质的鱼身上产生的副作用。

sentences.en: Conclusion The RPE cells can effectively ingest negatively charged macromolecules, possibly by scavenger receptor mediated endocytosis.
sentences.cn: 受体介导的RPE细胞的内吞作用可能是ipm内大分子物质代谢的重要机制.

sentences.en: Deputy Garman : [ On needing to ingest the loo ] I do order a lowercase more help.
sentences.cn: (想去洗手间 ) 我确实需要更多一点的帮助.

sentences.en: For external use only. Do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children.
sentences.cn: 仅外部使用, 不能吞食,避免儿童接触.

sentences.en: Let them climb, take trenches, physique bridges and ingest parachutes.
sentences.cn: 让它们攀爬, 挖沟, 架桥和使用降落伞.

sentences.en: Programs that ingest data , transform it, and then spit it out are called filters.
sentences.cn: 过滤器是指获取数据 、 将之转化并输出的程序.

sentences.en: Rodents ingest little bits of Toxo from cat feces and Toxo goes straight to their heads.
sentences.cn: 啮齿动物只要吸入少量的猫科动物的排泄物,弓形虫就会直接进入它们的头部.

sentences.en: The macrophages collect to ingest the lipid material.
sentences.cn: 巨噬细胞聚集起来吞噬脂质.

sentences.en: You will ingest only the lightest of substances.
sentences.cn: 你只将摄取最轻的物质.

trans.tran_en: to take food or other substances into your body

trans.tran_cn: 咽下，获取（某事物），吸收，接待
